subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Novak Djokovic and Stanislas Wawrinka won semifinal matches and will play for the title of the BA-CA Tennis Trophy in Vienna. Djokovic defeated Andreas Seppi, 6-4, 6-3, and Wawrinka downed Juan Carlos Ferrero, 7-5, 6-1. It will be the seventh final of the year for the third-ranked Djokovic, who has won four titles.
